code: @Test public void testOnExceptionRouteId() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:error").expectedMessageCount(0).     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:foo", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     RouteDefinition route = context.getRouteDefinition("foo").     assertNotNull(route).     assertEquals("foo", route.getId()). }
